title: Do you kil an afk or d/c player?
body: I do but i'm bad and need all the help i can get.

replies.body: If they dc'd at the start, and come back to lane a few levels behind, I tell them I won't kill them, then I go all out and use everything i have to kill them.
It's Ranked and they'd do the same to you
if its ranked then yes. lol i wanna win
i have never been left alone when i dc so i guess why not

Contentious issue :P Usually I just kill them because particularly if it's early on it doesn't mean much and they're back @ the nexus until their game's back up. But I don't try ridiculously hard to claim the kill (behind towers etc), and I've had a case where upon returning at level 1 with everyone else at around level 10 the entire team made beelines for me for an easy kill (even had a pantheon turret dive when I was at 100% health). 

I basically try not to make an issue of it. If they're in my way and I can kill them, fine, but it's not the objective of my game to mercilessly hunt players I know can't fight back.
If they are blocking the push then yes. If they are just dc at tower or away from the minion wave I leave them alone.
If it's ranked i do, if it's normals i tend to be a lot nicer.
You can't hear that for an enemy player. That only gets announced for your team.

I guess it is okay to kill an afk champ but a killing a d/c is bm?
But then how do you know the difference heh.
honestly...no i just have my team mates harass/push that lane after the dc leaves...
